survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Mental Health Resources Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction with the mental health resources provided by the workplace, identifying areas for improvement to support employee well-being.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources currently available at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better response analysis. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the mental health resources currently available at your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health resources have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture a comprehensive view of resource utilization.

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, have you faced when accessing mental health resources at work?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your workplace's mental health resources to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure likelihood. This helps gauge overall satisfaction and advocacy.
